## CombineDbStrategies type

Behavior when combine inconsistent DBs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CombineDbStrategies = 'throw-error' | 'resolve-by-ours' | 'resolve-by-their' | 'replace-with-ours' | 'replace-with-theirs';
```
